TopicTitle: Two Separate Bugs: Panther J-404 Temperature Overlay Bug and 0m/s Sun Orbit Kraken (Save Killer)

Articles.Content:
OS: Windows 7 64 bit SP1
KSP Build: 1.0.5.1028
Mods: Mechjeb

The first and easiest-to-observe bug is the J-404 Panther does not have a temperature overlay when I press F11. They must be fairly hot on afterburner though, as the back of my jet plane gets very yellow!

The second one I have reproduced twice with different saves appears to be a divide-by-zero bug when killing orbit speed above the Sun / Kerbol. Once orbit is very slow (Periapsis reads -261Mm and verticle speed less than 500mm/s) time-warp to 5x and the game breaks. For full-disclosure's sake I use a periapsis of 6Gm and an apoapsis of 60Gm. Once at 60Gm I manually burn retrograde until orbit = 0.0m/s. After 5x time warp is enabled all numbers display NaN and the game GUI breaks. If one is able to open the menu and return to the space center the entire solar system will be gone. The save becomes unrecoverable even after game restart or flight revert.
